ComicInfo.Summary:
“TOTAL ECLIPSE OF THE HEART,” Part Two
The birthday night is still young for Becky Kumar. While she tries to wrap her head around what happened in the first issue of MARCO B. BUCCI and JACOPO CAMAGNI’s urban fantasy saga, things take a turn for the weird as a mysterious ally enters the fray.
*List of covers and their creators:* Cover | Name | Creator(s) | Sidebar Location | ------------------------------------------------------------------------------ A | Cover A | Jacopo Camagni (a) & Stefania Simonini (c) | 1 | B | Cover B | David Lafuente (a) & German Garcia (c) | 2 | C | Cover C | Simone Di Meo | 3 |
